letters.description: Identify the client's unique Prakriti (constitution) and Vikriti (imbalance) through detailed assessment and observation.
Recognize patterns of physical, mental, and emotional imbalances using Ayurvedic diagnostic tools and client history.
Develop personalized lifestyle, dietary, and herbal recommendations to restore balance and promote well-being based on doshic needs.
Guide the client in integrating Ayurvedic principles into their daily routine, fostering mindful practices and positive habits.
Continuously monitor progress, adapt the plan as needed, and empower the client to maintain long-term health and vitality.
